snippet.title: The science of why golf balls have dimples
snippet.content:
While working on your perfect swing, have you ever looked down at a golf ball and wondered "What's with all the ridges?"? It's a simple question, but they play a big part in how far that ball can fly. Before golf balls had their dimples, your game was much worse.
